Class PersonNamePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctig.PersonNamePicker

  • public class PersonNamePicker
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to pick a person's first and last name based on gender and language.

        public PersonNamePicker.OriginType pickNameOrigin(int spanishPct)
        pick whether or not to generate an English or Spanish name
        Parameters:
        spanishPct - probability, in integer percentage form, that the name should be Spanish.

        the name origin type that was picked
